content: Fire Finish 120+ CFP-SP Steel protection spray High-finish, fiber-free, low-VOC intumescent fire protection spray for structural steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Intumescent coatings for steel- - - ### FEATURES:Features Formulated to provide an attractive final appearance Higher hangability – fewer coats required, boosting productivity Applications Protection of structural steel against fire Tested to ASTM E119 for up to five-hour fire ratings ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 0 g/l Approvals: ASTM E119 Base materials: Steel (with Approved Primer) Technical Data | LEED VOC | 0 g/l | Approvals | ASTM E119 | Base materials | Steel (with Approved Primer) | Application temperature range | 50 - 95 °F | Can be painted | Yes (with Approved Topcoat) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2136551 - 1x pail of FF120+ CFP-SP WB - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Fire Finish CFP-SP WB Firestop coating - 3544275 - 18x pails of FF120+ CFP-SP WB - Package Size 1 pc
